elementList.name: controller.java.vm
dao.java.vm
debug.json.vm
mapper.xml.vm
elementList.code:
##引入mybatis支持
$!{mybatisSupport.vm}

##设置保存名称与保存位置
$!callback.setFileName($tool.append($!{tableInfo.name}, "Mapper.xml"))
$!callback.setSavePath($tool.append($modulePath, "/src/main/resources/mapper"))

##拿到主键
#set($isCompositePk = false)
#if(!$tableInfo.pkColumn.isEmpty())
    #if($tableInfo.pkColumn.size() == 1)
        #set($pk = $tableInfo.pkColumn.get(0))
    #else
        #set($pk = $tableInfo.pkColumn)
        #set($isCompositePk = true)
    #end
#end

##特性字段预处理
#set($isDeleteColumn = false)
#set($isCreateTime = false)
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)
    #if($column.obj.name == "is_delete")
        #set($isDeleteColumn = true)
    #end
    #if($column.obj.name == "create_time")
        #set($isCreateTime = true)
    #end
#end

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="$!{tableInfo.savePackageName}.dao.$!{tableInfo.name}Dao">

    <resultMap type="$!{tableInfo.savePackageName}.domain.$!{tableInfo.name}" id="$!{tableInfo.name}Map">
#if($isCompositePk == false)
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.fullColumn)
        <result property="$!column.name" column="$!column.obj.name" jdbcType="$!column.ext.jdbcType"/>
#end
#else
#foreach($column in $pk)
        <id property="$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name" column="$!column.obj.name" jdbcType="$!column.ext.jdbcType"/>
#end
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)
        <result property="$!column.name" column="$!column.obj.name" jdbcType="$!column.ext.jdbcType"/>
#end
#end
    </resultMap>
    
    <sql id="allSqlColumn">
        #allSqlColumn()
        
    </sql>

    <!--查询单个-->
    <select id="get" resultMap="$!{tableInfo.name}Map">
        select
        <include refid="allSqlColumn"/>
        from $!tableInfo.obj.name
        where #if($isCompositePk == false)$!pk.obj.name = #{$!pk.name}#else#foreach($column in $pk)$!column.obj.name = #{$!column.name}#if($velocityHasNext) and #end#end#end#if($isDeleteColumn == true) and is_delete = false#end
    
    </select>

    <!--新增所有列-->
    <insert id="insert"#if($isCompositePk == false) keyProperty="$!pk.name" useGeneratedKeys="true"#end>
        insert into $!{tableInfo.obj.name}(#if($isCompositePk == true)#foreach($column in $pk)#if($foreach.index > 0), #end$!column.obj.name#end#end#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_user_id")#if($isCompositePk == true || $foreach.index > 0), #end$!column.obj.name#end#end)
        values (#if($isCompositePk == true)#foreach($column in $pk)#if($foreach.index > 0), #end#{$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name}#end#end#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_user_id")#if($isCompositePk == true || $foreach.index > 0), #end#{$!{column.name}}#end#end)
    </insert>

    <insert id="insertAll"#if($isCompositePk == false) keyProperty="$!pk.name" useGeneratedKeys="true"#end>
        insert into $!{tableInfo.obj.name}(#if($isCompositePk == true)#foreach($column in $pk)#if($foreach.index > 0), #end$!column.obj.name#end#end#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_user_id")#if($isCompositePk == true || $foreach.index > 0), #end$!column.obj.name#end#end)
        values
        <foreach collection="list" item="entity" separator=",">
        (#if($isCompositePk == true)#foreach($column in $pk)#if($foreach.index > 0), #end#{entity.$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name}#end#end#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_user_id")#if($isCompositePk == true || $foreach.index > 0), #end#{entity.$!{column.name}}#end#end)
        </foreach>
    </insert>
    
#if($tableInfo.otherColumn.size() > 0)
    <!--通过主键修改数据-->
    <update id="update">
        update $!{tableInfo.obj.name}
        <set>
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time" && $column.obj.name!="create_user_id")
                $!column.obj.name = #{$!column.name},
#end#end
        </set>
        where #if($isCompositePk == false)$!pk.obj.name = #{$!pk.name}#else#foreach($column in $pk)$!column.obj.name = #{$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name}#if($velocityHasNext) and #end#end#end
    
    </update>
#end

    <!--通过主键删除-->
    <delete id="delete">
#if($isDeleteColumn == true)
        update $!{tableInfo.obj.name} set is_delete = true, last_update_user_id = #{lastUpdateUserId} where #if($isCompositePk == false)$!pk.obj.name = #{$!pk.name}#else#foreach($column in $pk)$!column.obj.name = #{$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name}#if($velocityHasNext) and #end#end#end
#else
        delete from $!{tableInfo.obj.name} where #if($isCompositePk == false)$!pk.obj.name = #{$!pk.name}#else#foreach($column in $pk)$!column.obj.name = #{$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name}#if($velocityHasNext) and #end#end#end
#end
    
    </delete>
    
    <!--实体查询条件-->
    <sql id="entityWhereSql">
        <where>
#if($isCompositePk == false)
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.fullColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time" && $column.type!="boolean")
            <if test="$!column.name != null#if($column.type.equals("java.lang.String")) and $!column.name != ''#end">
                and $!column.obj.name = #{$!column.name}
            </if>
#end#end
#else
#foreach($column in $pk)
            <if test="$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name != null#if($column.type.equals("java.lang.String")) and $!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name != ''#end">
                and $!column.obj.name = #{$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name}
            </if>
#end
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time" && $column.type!="boolean")
            <if test="$!column.name != null#if($column.type.equals("java.lang.String")) and $!column.name != ''#end">
                and $!column.obj.name = #{$!column.name}
            </if>
#end#end
#end
#if($isDeleteColumn == true)
            and is_delete = false
#end
        </where>
    </sql>
    
    <!--通过实体作为筛选条件查询-->
    <select id="findByExample" resultMap="$!{tableInfo.name}Map">
        select
        <include refid="allSqlColumn"/>
        from $!tableInfo.obj.name
        <include refid="entityWhereSql"/>
    </select>
    
    <!--通过实体作为筛选条件返回单个实体-->
    <select id="findOneEntityByExample" resultMap="$!{tableInfo.name}Map">
        select
        <include refid="allSqlColumn"/>
        from $!tableInfo.obj.name
        <include refid="entityWhereSql"/>
    </select>
    
    <!--分页查询条件-->
    <sql id="pageConditionWhereSql">
        <where>
            <if test="filters != null">
#if($isCompositePk == false)
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.fullColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time")
                <if test="filters.$!column.name != null#if($column.type.equals("java.lang.String")) and filters.$!column.name != ''#end">
#if(!$column.type.equals("java.lang.String"))
                    and $!column.obj.name = #{filters.$!column.name}
#else
                    and $!column.obj.name like concat('%', #{filters.$!column.name}, '%')
#end                
                </if>
#end#end
#else
#foreach($column in $pk)
                <if test="filters.$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name != null#if($column.type.equals("java.lang.String")) and filters.$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name != ''#end">
                    and $!column.obj.name = #{filters.$!tool.firstLowerCase($tableInfo.name)UnionId.$!column.name}
                </if>
#end
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.otherColumn)#if($column.obj.name!="is_delete" && $column.obj.name!="create_time" && $column.obj.name!="last_update_time")
                <if test="filters.$!column.name != null#if($column.type.equals("java.lang.String")) and filters.$!column.name != ''#end">
                    and $!column.obj.name = #{filters.$!column.name}
                </if>
#end#end
#end
            </if>
#if($isDeleteColumn == true)
            and is_delete = false
#end
        </where>
    </sql>
    
    <!--分页查询排序页码-->
    <sql id="pageConditionOrderByAndLimitSql">
        <choose>
            <when test="orderBy == null">
#if($isCreateTime == true)
                order by create_time desc
#end
            </when>
            <otherwise>
                order by ${orderBy} ${orderSort}
            </otherwise>
        </choose>
        limit #{startOffSet}, #{endOffSet}
    </sql>
    
    <!--通过PageCondition对象作为筛选条件查询-->
    <select id="search" resultMap="$!{tableInfo.name}Map">
        select
        <include refid="allSqlColumn"/>
        from $!tableInfo.obj.name
        <include refid="pageConditionWhereSql"/>
        <include refid="pageConditionOrderByAndLimitSql"/>
    </select>
    
    <!--通过PageCondition对象作为筛选条件返回结果数量-->
    <select id="searchCount" resultType="java.lang.Integer">
        select
        count(*)
        from $!tableInfo.obj.name
        <include refid="pageConditionWhereSql"/>
    </select>

</mapper>

elementList.name: service.java.vm
serviceImpl.java.vm
domain.java.vm
serviceApi.java.vm
Vo.java.vm
autoImport.vm
elementList.value:
##自动导入包（仅导入实体属性需要的包，通常用于实体类）
#foreach($import in $importList)
import $!import;
#end

elementList.name: define.vm
elementList.value:
##（Velocity宏定义）

##定义设置表名后缀的宏定义，调用方式：#setTableSuffix("Test")
#macro(setTableSuffix $suffix)
    #set($tableName = $!tool.append($tableInfo.name, $suffix))
#end

##定义设置包名后缀的宏定义，调用方式：#setPackageSuffix("Test")
#macro(setPackageSuffix $suffix)
#if($suffix!="")package #end#if($tableInfo.savePackageName!="")$!{tableInfo.savePackageName}.#{end}$!suffix;
#end

##定义直接保存路径与文件名简化的宏定义，调用方式：#save("/entity", ".java")
#macro(save $path $fileName)
    $!callback.setSavePath($tool.append($tableInfo.savePath, $path))
    $!callback.setFileName($tool.append($tableInfo.name, $fileName))
#end

##定义表注释的宏定义，调用方式：#tableComment("注释信息")
#macro(tableComment $desc)
/**
 * $!{tableInfo.comment}($!{tableInfo.name})$desc
 *
 * @author $!author
 * @since $!time.currTime()
 */
#end

##定义GET，SET方法的宏定义，调用方式：#getSetMethod($column)
#macro(getSetMethod $column)

    public $!{tool.getClsNameByFullName($column.type)} get$!{tool.firstUpperCase($column.name)}() {
        return $!{column.name};
    }

    public void set$!{tool.firstUpperCase($column.name)}($!{tool.getClsNameByFullName($column.type)} $!{column.name}) {
        this.$!{column.name} = $!{column.name};
    }
#end

elementList.name: init.vm
elementList.value:
##初始化区域

##去掉表的t_前缀
$!tableInfo.setName($tool.getClassName($tableInfo.obj.name.replaceFirst("book_","")))

##参考阿里巴巴开发手册，POJO 类中布尔类型的变量，都不要加 is 前缀，否则部分框架解析会引起序列化错误
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.fullColumn)
#if($column.name.startsWith("is") && $column.type.equals("java.lang.Boolean"))
    $!column.setName($tool.firstLowerCase($column.name.substring(2)))
#end
#end

##实现动态排除列
#set($temp = $tool.newHashSet("testCreateTime", "otherColumn"))
#foreach($item in $temp)
    #set($newList = $tool.newArrayList())
    #foreach($column in $tableInfo.fullColumn)
        #if($column.name!=$item)
            ##带有反回值的方法调用时使用$tool.call来消除返回值
            $tool.call($newList.add($column))
        #end
    #end
    ##重新保存
    $tableInfo.setFullColumn($newList)
#end

##对importList进行篡改
#set($temp = $tool.newHashSet())
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.fullColumn)
    #if(!$column.type.startsWith("java.lang.") && $column.type != "boolean")
        ##带有反回值的方法调用时使用$tool.call来消除返回值
        $tool.call($temp.add($column.type))
    #end
#end
##覆盖
#set($importList = $temp)

elementList.name: mybatisSupport.vm
elementList.value:
##针对Mybatis 进行支持，主要用于生成xml文件
#foreach($column in $tableInfo.fullColumn)
    ##储存列类型
    $tool.call($column.ext.put("sqlType", $tool.getField($column.obj.dataType, "typeName")))
    #if($tool.newHashSet("java.lang.String").contains($column.type))
        #set($jdbcType="VARCHAR")
    #elseif($tool.newHashSet("java.lang.Boolean", "boolean").contains($column.type))
        #set($jdbcType="BOOLEAN")
    #elseif($tool.newHashSet("java.lang.Byte", "byte").contains($column.type))
        #set($jdbcType="BYTE")
    #elseif($tool.newHashSet("java.lang.Integer", "int", "java.lang.Short", "short").contains($column.type))
        #set($jdbcType="INTEGER")
    #elseif($tool.newHashSet("java.lang.Long", "long").contains($column.type))
        #set($jdbcType="INTEGER")
    #elseif($tool.newHashSet("java.lang.Float", "float", "java.lang.Double", "double").contains($column.type))
        #set($jdbcType="NUMERIC")
    #elseif($tool.newHashSet("java.util.Date", "java.sql.Timestamp", "java.time.Instant", "java.time.LocalDateTime", "java.time.OffsetDateTime", "	java.time.ZonedDateTime").contains($column.type))
        #set($jdbcType="TIMESTAMP")
    #elseif($tool.newHashSet("java.sql.Date", "java.time.LocalDate").contains($column.type))
        #set($jdbcType="TIMESTAMP")
    #else
        ##其他类型
        #set($jdbcType="VARCHAR")
    #end
    $tool.call($column.ext.put("jdbcType", $jdbcType))
#end

##定义宏，查询所有列
#macro(allSqlColumn)#foreach($column in $tableInfo.fullColumn)$column.obj.name#if($velocityHasNext), #end#end#end
